Transformative Principal Podcast Episode 1

08 Dec 2013

This interview with Sandra Jolovich-Motes (JM) is really fantastic. This is part one of two.

JM is making huge gains in her standardized test scores by focusing on data. She is an advocate of Paul Bambrick-Santoya's approach and recommends all principals take advantage of his books and resources.

Have a good life.
